channel.title: The E3: Discussion And Stuff thread.
channel.description:
Use this thread to talk about past/future E3 events and did you find them good? Did you see what you were hoping to see?
Since EP3 didn't show and Valve are showing that L4D2 which i am starting to have doubts about.. Only a few games made me feel happy:
Crackdown 2 Split Second And dome other stuff buy my mind is tired to name them now. :fffuuu:

item.description:
Use this thread to talk about past/future E3 events and did you find them good?
Did you see what you were hoping to see?

Since EP3 didn’t show and Valve are showing that L4D2 which i am starting to have doubts about… Only a few games made me feel happy:

And dome other stuff buy my mind is tired to name them now. :fffuuu:
